alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Berrien; Irwin; Tift (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 5:26PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Irwin, northeastern Berrien, east central Tift and Ben Hill Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 526 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Mystic to near Willacoochee. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fitzgerald, Ocilla, Enigma, Alapaha, Mystic, Lulaville, Gladys, Osierfield, Glory, Pinetta, Ashton, Bannockburn, Irwinville, Fitzgerald Municipal A/P, Wray, Bowens Mill, Red Bluff, Abba and Queensland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
